about.presentation: Hey there! I'm Kauan, a fullstack developer and aspiring software engineer

start.title: The First Spark
start.content: From an early age, I was always very close to computers, mainly because of games, that's where the spark for technology was ignited. Over time, this interest only grew stronger. I began my journey in the technical course of Industrial Automation at SENAI, where I had my first real contact with programming.

education.title: Making It Real
education.content: During my Software Engineering degree at Univates, I sought to put theory into practice. I took part in the Level-up program at Interact Solutions as a trainee and later worked as a scientific initiation scholar, with projects in robotics and teaching computational thinking. These experiences taught me a lot, not only technically, but also how to interact with people of different profiles, from children to adults.

career.title: The Road So Far
career.content: Throughout my studies, my career evolved consistently. As a junior fullstack developer, I worked on a legacy, monolithic, and tightly coupled system, which taught me how to deal with complexity and technical limitations. Later, as a mid-level developer, I was given the responsibility of maintaining and evolving a system for which I was the main person in charge. This provided me with valuable experience in autonomy, decision-making, and strategic alignment with stakeholders. As a systems analyst, I managed projects, developed APIs, built frontends decoupled from backends, and delivered containerized solutions, ensuring quality, scalability, and efficiency.

clients.title: Learning through People
clients.content: Working side by side with clients gave me more than requirements and demands, it taught me to understand expectations, needs, and how a product can truly make a difference. That's why I believe clear communication is essential. At every stage of development, I strive to prioritize user experience, ensuring that the software is not only functional but also simple, intuitive, and pleasant to use, delivering real value to those who depend on it.

beyond.title: Life Beyond Code
beyond.content: When I'm not immersed in lines of code, I like to stay active. Fitness and sports have always been part of my routine, whether lifting weights, cycling, or playing volleyball. I also enjoy exploring new places and cultures, something the exchange program has offered me plenty of opportunities for. And of course, I never left behind my gamer side: since the days of Pok√©mon on the Game Boy, games have been a way for me to have fun and also connect with friends.

current.title: These Days
current.content: I am currently in the 8th semester of Software Engineering and have started my exchange program at the Polytechnic Institute of Leiria (ESTG), in Portugal. For now, my position as a Systems Analyst at Univates is on hold. I am taking this opportunity to expand my horizons, learn new technologies and cultures, and bring an international perspective to my career.
